short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the large Outside bar and Beta articles from pinkbike.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the large and obtrusive "Outside" header bar that appears at the top of every page pinkbike.com page. Also prevents links to articles from Beta MTB from appearing in the main feed.
